name: Pocket Ninjas
description:
The most ninja action possible........without having to go to the trouble of actually being a ninja.

Swipe your finger across the screen to hack and slash your enemies while dodging shurikens, ditching Geisha, and ducking bad Sushi!

You can climb to the top of the leader board by slicing and dicing through waves and waves of intruders and collecting points with the tip of your sword!

Customize your Pocket Ninja with new looks, weapons, and abilities!
